messages.subject: Not a Choctaw...he was a Chinook
messages.msgSnippet: My mistake... the guy I was refering to was a Chinook who was born in America, but lived in Canada (in a Metis boarding school). Apparently, he believed that
messages.messageBody:
My mistake... the guy I was refering to was a Chinook who was born in
America, but lived in Canada (in a Metis boarding school).

Apparently, he believed that Japan was "the ancestors" (which was way
before anybody postulated that Native Americans were Asian descendants)
and he traveled to Japan.

Anyway, I found many sites with info, so if nobody feels that
posting info on this guy, that will be fine.

Thanks!
